EmailTemplate.description: used to notify Websites Manager that there is a new project
EmailTemplate.name: New Project - Websites
EmailTemplate.subject: There is a new project created for {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Opportunity__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A new project has been generated for your team, {!SFDC_520_Quote__c.Opportunity__c}. You may view a report of the Project Pieces for this Project by clicking the link below:
View Report<br/
You may assign the Project Pieces by clicking into each Project Piece Number one by one from the above report, or do a "multi-select" assignment of Project Pieces by viewing and multi-select assigning them through this link:
Assign View
(The Project Pieces can be sorted by Project Number or by Account Name from the above view)
